title: Best Calisthenics Gyms in Pune
summary: Discover the top calisthenics gyms in Pune where you can build strength and join a vibrant fitness community.

body.raw:
# Best Calisthenics Gyms in Pune
Embark on a fitness journey like no other in Pune, where the vibrant culture meets a thriving calisthenics scene. If you're eager to strengthen your body, break a sweat, and be part of a dynamic fitness community, you're in the right place. These are the best calisthenics park in Pune. ## 1. **Zenith Calipark**
**Location**: [Wakad](https://maps.app.goo.gl/d3zL2XFs6hLmTzMM6) **About**: Zenith Calipark is the first calisthenics park in PCMC, offering state-of-the-art facilities for bodyweight training. The park is designed to cater to calisthenics enthusiasts of all levels, providing a community-centric approach to fitness. **Instagram**: [Zenith Calipark](https://www.instagram.com/zenithcalipark) ## 2. **AlphaNation Calisthenics Gym**
**Location**: [Kalyani Nagar](https://maps.app.goo.gl/6Y9uGDjhwPieWANo9) **About**: AlphaNation Calisthenics Gym offers a holistic fitness experience curated by international athletes and exercise physiology experts. Their training programs focus on comprehensive fitness, including calisthenics, strength training, and more. **Instagram**: [AlphaNation Calisthenics Gym](https://www.instagram.com/alphanation.calisthenics) ## 3. **MuscleBar**
**Location**: [Ghorpadi](https://maps.app.goo.gl/CeZeLMbzK7jVWKKx8) **About**: Launched in February 2019, MuscleBar is located in Pune's serene Sopanbaug neighborhood. It features a unique combination of natural light and seasoned equipment, making it a great place for intense calisthenics workouts. **Website**: [MuscleBar](https://www.musclebar.in) **Instagram**: [MuscleBar](https://www.instagram.com/musclebar.pune) ## 4. **Strize Fitness**
**Location**: [Balewadi](https://maps.app.goo.gl/BHFPjn9ZiaRurhhk9) **About**: Strize Fitness is known as India's highest altitude calisthenics center. It offers a specialized environment for calisthenics enthusiasts looking to challenge themselves and achieve new heights in their fitness journey. **Instagram**: [Strize Fitness](https://www.instagram.com/strizefitness) ## 5. **Cali Keeda**
**Location**: [Shaniwar Peth, Sinhagad Road](https://maps.app.goo.gl/etnTAgmW8hBwZp9s6) **About**: Cali Keeda offers a holistic approach to calisthenics, emphasizing the significance of health and nutrition. Their vision is to transform lifestyles through dedicated training and education. Their motto is #KeedaHaitoKarega. **Website**: [Cali Keeda](https://calikeeda.com) **Instagram**: [Cali Keeda](https://www.instagram.com/calikeeda)
